name: Heroes vs Dragon Card Game
description:
This is a card game concept designed and prototyped by me for a computer game development class at University of California, Irvine.

Feel free to duplicate and play around with it! 

Credits: 

The Starlight team: Shawn Wang (Design), Justin Lock (Design), Akshita Nathani (Brochure), Jose Andrade (Website), Kayla Carrera (Promo trailer), Sarah Faille (Script)

Professor: Darren Denenberg (INF 125 Computer Game Development)

Icons: https://www.flaticon.com/
Pixel background: https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest
